Directions: Use the information below to answer each question that follows.
Content: Kate bought a sketch notebook, a box of 12 colored pencils, a package of 15 erasers, and a box of 13 pastel chalk sticks.

:ibox:• The box of colored pencils cost $9.01.

• The package of erasers cost $0.98.

• The box of pastel chalk sticks cost $5.01.

• The sales tax rate for all the items is 8%.

• The amount of sales tax was $1.62.

• The total cost was $21.87.
What is the cost of the sketch notebook?
